-- Обновляем фокус на разрешённое устройство
UPDATE appeals
SET
  last_mentioned_device_id = '{{ $json.disambiguation.device_id }}'::uuid,
  conversation_focus = jsonb_set(
    COALESCE(conversation_focus, '{}'::jsonb),
    '{device_id}',
    '"{{ $json.disambiguation.device_id }}"'
  ),
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid;

SELECT ad.*, b.name as brand_name, m.name as model_name
FROM appeal_devices ad
LEFT JOIN brands b ON b.id = ad.brand_id
LEFT JOIN models m ON m.id = ad.model_id
WHERE ad.id = '{{ $json.disambiguation.device_id }}'::uuid;
